name: Fishing Planet: Lucky Start Pack
detailed_description:
Hey there, Angler!
New to Fishing Planet and can't wait to get access to new fishing destinations? How about getting the tackle for a real predator hunt without having to wait?
Yup, it’s possible RIGHT NOW with this amazing Lucky Start Pack!
The goodies in this exclusive Pack for our new Fishing Planet friends include all the necessary tackle, pond passes, equipment, fishing licenses and even Premium Account that’ll help you advance faster and get the most out of your fishing experience! Don’t limit yourself! You can tune in and feel the drive of some hardcore fishing right now - just grab the Lucky Start Pack and head on to Mudwater River or beautiful lakes Emerald and Rocky to land some predators like Bass, Pike or Trout!
Skip the routine and get access to 3 awesome fishing destinations NOW! Catch Trophy Bass and Pike on Missouri and Emerald Lake while enjoying Trout fishing on Lake Rocky! Durable rods and reels, awesome tackle, 7-day Pond Passes and Advanced Licenses along with exclusive Cap and Keepnet available only in this Pack!

Lucky Start Pack includes:
10.000 CREDITS - use your Credits to purchase new tackle, pay for fishing trips, repairs and any other in-game expenses. Spend your money wisely!
10 BAITCOINS - use to purchase certain fishing tackle, available only for BaitCoins. Spend your BaitCoins wisely!
7-DAY PREMIUM Enjoy seven days of Premium Status and advance your game progress by getting a 50% boost to your XP as well as x2 Credits you get for selling fish! You also get the privilege of free registration in Competitions and the advantage of using free Forward Time function twice as often!

RODS ‘N REELS superb predator combos!
Rods:
  • ValueCast 200 SE - Length: 6' 6"; Lure Weight: 1/4–6/7 Oz.; Power: Med Light; Line Weight: 4–9 Lb.; Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 11 (Length: 2 m; Lure Weight: 7–25 g; Power: Med Light; Line Weight: 2–4 kg; Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 11)
  • OmniFloat 450 SE - Length: 14' 10"; Line Weight: 3–7.5 Lb.; Action: Moderate; Pieces: 3; Guides: 14 (Length: 4.5 m; Line Weight: 1.5–3.5 kg; Action: Moderate; Pieces: 3; Guides: 14)
Reels:
  • LowDex 1500 P SE - Ratio: 6.6:1; Recovery: 19.5"; Capacity: mono 3/80, braid 6/100; Max Drag: 7.7 Lb.; (Ratio: 6.6:1; Recovery: 50 cm; Capacity: mono 0.18/80, braid 0.15/100; Max Drag: 3.5 kg)
  • InspireCast 3000 SE - Ratio: 5.1:1; Recovery: 27.5"; Capacity: mono 12/100, braid 20/135; Max Drag: 6.4 Lb.; (Ratio: 5.1:1; Recovery: 70 cm; Capacity: mono 0.3/100, braid 0.23/135; Max Drag: 2.9 kg)

TERMINAL TACKLE- a selection of tackle for the ultimate predator fishing experience!
  • Lines:
  • Braid .0055" - Length: 1000 yd; Test: 7.5 Lb.; (Length: 1000 m; Test: 3.5 kg; Diameter: 0.13 mm)
  • Fluoro .008" - Length: 1000 yd; Test: 6 Lb.; (Length: 1000 m; Test: 2.7 kg; Diameter: 0.20 mm)
  • Spoons:
  • Casting Spoon 1/4 Oz. (7 g) , #1/0 (x2);
  • Narrow Spoon 1/4 Oz. (7 g), #1/0 (x2)
  • Bass Jigs:
  • Mini Bass Jig 1/3 Oz. (9 g), #1
  • Mini Bass Jig 1/3 Oz. (9 g), #2
  • Floats:
  • Chubby (X2)
  • Hooks:
  • Hook #2
  • Hook #1
  • Hook #1/0
  • Baits:
  • Pet Food
  • Small Cutbait
  • Small Minnows
  • Grasshoppers
  • Mayflies.

EQUIPMENT – Tackle storage and other angling equipment.
  • Predator Hunter Cap - Tackles: 1
  • FishHut S Plus Keepnet - Max Single Fish Weight: 15.5 Lb.; Total Fish Weight: 31 Lb.; Fish-Friendly: yes; (Max Single Fish Weight: 7 kg; Total Fish Weight: 14 kg; )
  • Triple Case Rod Case - Rods: 3;
  • MagFin™ EasyFish Lure Box - Tackles: 10; Lines: 1;

POND PASSES - 7 days of unlimited access to some of the top predator fishing destinations!
  • Mudwater River (Missouri)
  • Emerald Lake (New York)
  • Rocky Lake (Colorado)

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
  • Advanced Texas License
  • Advanced Missouri License
  • Advanced New York License
  • Advanced Colorado License

supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese-Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
